distances.secondary.snd

Class SharedNeighborCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.CombinedMetric
      • distances.secondary.snd.SharedNeighborCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SharedNeighborCalculator
extends CombinedMetric
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a secondary metric that is based on shared nearest neighbors.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        snf - SharedNeighborFinder for kNN set intersection calculations.
